e-invoice.title: E-Invoice
e-invoice.subtitle: Digital Invoice Solutions
e-invoice.heroDescription: Transform your invoicing process with secure, automated digital solutions that ensure compliance while reducing costs and improving efficiency.
e-invoice.fullDescription: E-Invoice is not just a digital transformation tool, but also an investment in the future of your business. Our comprehensive e-invoicing solution ensures seamless compliance with local and international regulations while dramatically reducing processing time and operational costs. Built with enterprise-grade security and scalability in mind.

benefits.0: Reduce invoice processing time by up to 80%
benefits.1: Ensure 100% legal compliance with tax regulations
benefits.3: Real-time invoice tracking and status updates
benefits.4: Seamless integration with existing ERP systems

0.title: Automated Processing
0.description: Intelligent automation handles invoice generation, validation, and submission without manual intervention.

1.title: Legal Compliance
1.description: Built-in compliance checks ensure all invoices meet local tax authority requirements and regulations.

2.title: Real-time Tracking
2.description: Monitor invoice status in real-time with detailed tracking and delivery confirmations.

3.title: Cloud-Based Platform
3.description: Secure cloud infrastructure ensures 99.9% uptime and seamless scalability as your business grows.

e-invoice.roi: Average ROI of 300% within first year of implementation

e-archive-invoice.title: E-Archive Invoice
e-archive-invoice.subtitle: Secure Invoice Storage Solutions
e-archive-invoice.heroDescription: Secure, long-term storage solutions for your digital invoices with full legal compliance and easy retrieval capabilities.
e-archive-invoice.fullDescription: E-Archive Invoice provides a comprehensive digital archiving solution that ensures your invoices are securely stored, legally compliant, and always accessible. Our robust archiving system eliminates the need for physical document storage while maintaining full audit trails and regulatory compliance.

benefits.1: Full legal compliance with retention requirements

0.title: Secure Storage
0.description: Enterprise-grade encryption ensures your archived invoices remain secure and protected from unauthorized access.

1.title: Easy Retrieval
1.description: Advanced search capabilities allow instant retrieval of any archived invoice using multiple search criteria.

2.title: Legal Compliance
2.description: Automated compliance management ensures all archived documents meet legal retention requirements.

3.title: Audit Ready
3.description: Complete audit trails and tamper-proof storage make your archive always ready for regulatory inspections.

e-archive-invoice.roi: Reduce document storage costs by up to 70%

e-export.title: E-Export
e-export.subtitle: Digital Export Solutions
e-export.heroDescription: Simplify international trade with comprehensive digital export documentation and compliance management solutions.
e-export.fullDescription: E-Export streamlines your international trade operations with digital export documentation, automated compliance checks, and seamless integration with customs authorities. Expand your global reach with confidence, knowing all export procedures are digitally managed and compliant.

0.title: Export Documentation
0.description: Automated generation of all required export documents including certificates, permits, and declarations.

1.title: Compliance Management
1.description: Built-in compliance checks ensure all exports meet destination country requirements and regulations.

2.title: International Standards
2.description: Full compliance with international trade standards and customs requirements across multiple jurisdictions.

3.title: Process Automation
3.description: End-to-end automation reduces manual work and eliminates common export processing errors.

e-export.roi: Reduce export processing time by up to 60%

e-commerce.subtitle: Online Commerce Platform

e-commerce.fullDescription: Our E-Commerce platform provides everything you need to build, manage, and scale your online business. From inventory management to customer experience optimization, our comprehensive tools help you succeed in the digital marketplace with professional-grade features and seamless integrations.

0.title: Store Management

e-delivery-note.title: E-Delivery Note
e-delivery-note.subtitle: Digital Delivery Documentation
e-delivery-note.heroDescription: Digitize your delivery documentation process with real-time tracking and automated record-keeping for legal compliance.
e-delivery-note.fullDescription: E-Delivery Note eliminates paper-based delivery documentation and embraces digital efficiency. Our solution provides real-time delivery confirmation, automated record-keeping, and ensures legal compliance while reducing administrative overhead and improving delivery accuracy.

0.title: Digital Documentation
0.description: Complete digitization of delivery notes with electronic signatures and timestamp verification.

1.title: Real-time Tracking
1.description: Live tracking of deliveries with GPS integration and status updates throughout the delivery process.

2.title: Delivery Confirmation
2.description: Digital proof of delivery with recipient signatures and photo confirmation capabilities.

3.title: Legal Compliance
3.description: Ensures all delivery documentation meets legal requirements with tamper-proof digital records.

e-ledger.title: E-Ledger
e-ledger.subtitle: Digital Financial Ledger
e-ledger.heroDescription: Transform financial record-keeping with digital ledger solutions ensuring legal compliance and financial transparency.
e-ledger.fullDescription: E-Ledger provides a comprehensive digital bookkeeping solution that maintains accurate, auditable financial records with automated processes. Our system ensures regulatory compliance while providing real-time financial insights and reducing the complexity of financial management.

0.title: Digital Bookkeeping

1.description: Built-in compliance features ensure all records meet local and international accounting standards.

2.title: Automated Reports
2.description: Generate comprehensive financial reports automatically with customizable templates and scheduling.

3.title: Audit Trail
3.description: Complete audit trail with timestamp verification and user activity tracking for transparency.

1.title: Order Management

2.title: Customer Experience

about.title: Specialized SAP Consulting for
about.subtitle: Financial Transformation
about.description: ESM Information Technologies is a specialized SAP consulting and technology firm focused on driving financial transformation and digital compliance for enterprises.
about.paragraph1: We deliver end-to-end SAP integration and optimization services, empowering organizations to streamline financial operations, enhance regulatory compliance, and digitize core processes with confidence.
about.paragraph2: Our expertise spans expert SAP consulting, implementation, and support tailored to financial transformation, IFRS adaptation, and process automation. We provide comprehensive SAP-native solutions that simplify complex financial tasks and reduce operational costs.
about.paragraph3: With a deep focus on automation, compliance, and SAP-native design, we enable enterprises to meet evolving digital and regulatory demands while maintaining the highest standards of data security and operational efficiency.

We combine industry best practices with your unique business requirements to deliver transformational results.

sap-erp-implementation.fullDescription: Our SAP ERP Implementation services cover end-to-end deployment of SAP systems, including all major modules like FI/CO, MM, SD, PP, and HCM. We ensure seamless integration, data migration, and user adoption for successful ERP transformation.
sap-erp-implementation.description: Complete SAP ERP implementation and enhancement services tailored to your business needs.

benefits.0: Streamlined business processes across all departments
benefits.2: Improved data accuracy and reporting capabilities
benefits.3: Enhanced operational efficiency and cost reduction

3.description: Manufacturing execution system setup with production planning, scheduling, and shop floor control integration.
